description:
We're heading into Thanksgiving turkey season, and perhaps you're already researching how to cook that big, intimidating piece of poultry. There are questions that immediately emerge: How much turkey should I buy? What's the best way to cook it? Should I brine the bird? Brining will help you cook the most succulent turkey you've ever had â€” and the smartest, easiest way to do it is with a dry brine. Even if you're hosting Thanksgiving for the first time and are a bit nervous about cooking your inaugural turkey, here's how to dry-brine your turkey like a pro and turn out an impeccably juicy, delicious bird.

Get step-by-step instructions here: https://www.thekitchn.com/how-to-dry-brine-a-turkey-cooking-lessons-from-the-kitchn-212426
name: How To Dry Brine a Turkey
